## PublishingService.getPublishedTo() method

Gets a summary of all publishing targets for a specified item. This operation returns an instance of 'PublishInfo' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getPublishedTo(escapedItemId: string): CancelablePromise<Array<PublishInfo>>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type   | Description                                                                                     |
| ------------- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| escapedItemId | string | The URI of an item with the colon escaped by replacing it with an underscore. E.g. "tcm_0-1-1". |

**Returns:**

[CancelablePromise](./open-api-client.cancelablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;Array&lt;[PublishInfo](./open-api-client.publishinfo.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;

PublishInfo The request was successful.

## Exceptions

ApiError
